full_summary:
================================

## Tender Announcement - Asbestos, Lead, and Mold Abatement

### Notice Title
ASBESTOS, LEAD AND MOLD ABATEMENT

### Solicitation Number
WS3839337938

### Tender Status
Expired

### Category
Service

### Notice Type
Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

### Description
The Government of Canada invites contractors to submit bids for a Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) to provide labour, materials, and equipment for Lead, Mold, and Asbestos abatement/removal at various buildings and locations.

### Specifications
The work includes the removal of asbestos, lead, and mold from various locations in accordance with the specifications outlined in this SOA.

### Tender Conditions
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and others
- **Warranty**: Not specified

### Contracting Entity
- **Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information
- **Name**: Rosemary Trahan (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email**: [rosemary.trahan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rosemary.trahan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Tel**: Not available
- **Fax**: Not available

### Note
The tender notice is available on the [Ariba Network](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15777459?extsite=MTU3Nzc0NTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

Please note that the above text has been rephrased to make it more professional and concise to fit within the 400-word limit.
